abstract: A debate in tech circles questions whether Apple’s iPad is a good or bad thing for the development of innovative software.
snippet: A debate in tech circles questions whether Apple’s iPad is a good or bad thing for the development of innovative software.
lead_paragraph: On a day in which the majority of tech news consists of breathless examination of the first round of iPad Apps, Cory Doctorow writes on the blog Boing Boing that the iPad will discourage innovation.

headline.main: Will the iPad Cause the End of Innovation?
